items.title: French-Algerian writer jailed over Morocco comments
items.description: Boualem Sansal, 80, told a far-right news outlet that colonial France gave too much land to Algeria.

items.title: VP's arrest ends South Sudan peace deal, his party says
items.description: Riek Machar and his wife are detained after a convoy of 20 armed vehicles entered his home, his party says.

items.title: Why have the wildfires in S Korea been so devastating?
items.description: Strong wind, dry land and pine trees are a dangerous combination for wildfires, experts say.

items.title: Zelensky hopes US will 'stand strong' in face of Russian demands
items.description: The Ukrainian president was answering questions from a panel of European journalists in Paris.

items.title: Trump announces 25% tariffs on car imports to US
items.description: The US President says the tariffs on cars will come into effect on 2 April and car parts a month later.
